meanings.definition: Not in accordance with accepted standards of behavior or propriety.
meanings.sent1: Her unseemliness outfit raised eyebrows at the formal event.
meanings.sent2: The teacher reprimanded the student for his unseemliness behavior in class.
meanings.sent3: It was quite unseemliness when the dog started barking during the wedding ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The unseemliness conduct of the guests left a lasting impression on the host.
meanings.sent5: The unseemliness remarks made by the politician caused a stir in the community.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inappropriate or unsuitable.
meanings.sent1: The unseemliness of his actions was evident to everyone present.
meanings.sent2: She was shocked by the unseemliness of the situation.
meanings.sent3: The unseemliness of wearing pajamas to a job interview was comical.
meanings.sent4: The unseemliness of the decision cast a shadow over the entire project.
meanings.sent5: The unseemliness of the proposal made it difficult to take seriously.
